13. Pulpectomy
14. Dental X-ray
15. Dental Crowns

My teeth issue:

The molar tooth was infected. I went to other dentists earlier. They didn't follow the filling procedure properly. So the molar tooth was heavily infected after a few years.

Treatment:

I visited the Smile Solutions clinic after viewing the Dr. M. Srikanth profile in Practo. The doctor advised me to extract the tooth and do an implant. I told him to save the tooth. Then the doctor started the root canal treatment. The doctor told me that it would take 3 weeks to complete. Because of the heavy infection. In between 3 weeks, the doctor identified other decayed teeth and recommended filling, which was completed. Also, the doctor advised me to do a deep cleaning.

The doctor told me that the infection is reduced and the RCT tooth is ready for further procedures. Such as accessing and cleaning the roots, drilling through the tooth to access the root canals and pulp chamber, shaping the canals, filling the canals, filling the access hole, and healing. Once it was completed, the doctor grinded the tooth to measure the crown.

The doctor explained to me about crown types and the cost of the crown. Metal crown, porcelain fused metal crown, all-ceramic crown, CAD/CAM zirconia crown. I chose the CAD/CAM zirconia crown. Zirconia crowns are incredibly strong and resistant to fracture. With proper oral care and regular visits to the dentist, zirconia crowns can easily last 15 to 20 years. Now everything is fine. Let's see what happens in the future.

Actually, before every visit to the clinic, I studied about cleaning, cleaning instruments, filling, filling materials, deep cleaning, root canel treatment, RCT procedures, types of crowns, and which crown is giving more life. Also, cost comparison with other dentists for each treatment. That's why I didn't discuss much about treatment with the doctors in the Smile Solutions dental clinic. The cost for each treatment is reasonable at the Smile Solution dental clinic. The output is fantastic. Dr. M. Srikanth is very friendly. The way other doctors and assistants treated me was great. I am recommending this doctor for dental patients.Â 

Thank you, doctor.Â
